MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a modifiable deep copy clone of this .
Docs.returns: A modifiable deep copy clone of this .

remarks.format:
## Remarks This Clone method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, this Clone method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be `false` even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is `true.`
When copying dependency properties, Clone copies resource references and data bindings (although they might no longer resolve) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
